node.html:
• Contributed to the digital transformation of a Fortune 100 U.S. health insurer as part of Deloitte USI’s product and platform team.

  • Collaborated with Product Management and Engineering to refine requirements in Jira, clarifying acceptance criteria and dependencies across multiple release cycles.

  • Implemented modular microservices using Angular and Spring Boot, leveraging REST APIs to support parallel development streams and improve system reliability.

  • Helped design and maintain Agile delivery dashboards (cycle time, deployment frequency, escaped defects), enabling data-driven decisions on release readiness and delivery health.

  • Led and supported UAT for 50+ features, deriving scenarios from acceptance criteria, triaging defects with Engineering, and documenting outcomes to reduce post-release rework.

  • Wrote and maintained automated tests and documentation to improve coverage and streamline handoffs between development, QA, and business stakeholders.

  • Technology: Angular, Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, SQL, Jira

  • Certificates

• Recognized at Deloitte USI with multiple performance awards — Spot Award (2023, 2024), Applause Award (2024) — for consistently delivering high-quality work on a major U.S. healthcare client engagement.
  • Recognized by HCSC with Outstanding Performance Award (2024) — ffor consistently delivering high-quality features and cross-team collaboration on a critical claims platform engagement.
  • Winner in the “Code Innovation Series Hackathon” organized by GitHub and IncubateIND at Manipal Institute of Technology (August 2021) earning a Certificate of Appreciation for building a working solution under tight time constraints with your team.
  • Served as a Tech Mentor at Deloitte USI, conducting weekly Java/Angular mentoring sessions for new joiners and creating onboarding SOPs to help them ramp up faster.
